articles.title: Childish Gambino sued by rapper alleging copyright infringement over ‘This Is America’ - NME
articles.description: Childish Gambino has been sued for copyright infringement by rapper Kidd Wes, who alleges 'This Is America' copied the latter's song 'Made In America'.
articles.content:
Childish Gambino aka Donald Glover has been sued for alleged copyright infringement by Florida rapper Kidd Wes, with the former’s hit single ‘This Is America’ at the centre of proceedings.

articles.title: Sotheby’s to accept bitcoin, ethereum for Banksy auction - The Indian Express
articles.description: Digital artwork by American artist Mike Winkelmann, who is better known as Beeple, sold for nearly $70 million at Christie's in March, in the first-ever sale by a major auction house of a piece of art that does not exist in physical form
articles.content: Sotheby’s said on Tuesday it would accept bitcoin and ethereum as payment for Banksy’s iconic artwork Love is in the Air, a first for a physical art auction and the latest sign of growing mainstream … [+1109 chars]
